content:
Candles are always a great idea! You can never go wrong with a nice set of candles as a gift.

For similar price ranges, here are some gift ideas that might interest you:

1. **Wine and Cheese Gift Basket**: A thoughtful gift for wine enthusiasts, you can put together a basket with a bottle of wine, gourmet cheese, crackers, and fruit. ($40-$60)
2. **Gourmet Food Basket**: Put together a basket filled with artisanal goodies like specialty teas, chocolates, nuts, or spices. ($30-$50)
3. **Luxurious Bath and Body Products**: A set of high-end bath bombs, body lotions, and scented soaps from a brand like L'Occitane or The Body Shop would make a lovely gift. ($40-$60)
4. **Coffee or Tea Accessories**: A nice coffee mug, a set of tea infusers, or a bag of gourmet coffee beans would be a thoughtful gift for coffee and tea lovers. ($20-$40)
5. **Book or Magazine Subscription**: A bestselling book or a subscription to a magazine that aligns with their interests would be a great gift. ($10-$30)
6. **Desk Accessories**: A nice pen holder, a fun mousepad, or a set of colorful paperweights can brighten up their workspace. ($20-$40)
7. **Fun and Games**: A board game, a puzzle, or a deck of cards would be a great way to encourage socializing and bonding. ($20-$40)
8. **Personalized Keychain or Mug**: A customized keychain or mug with their name or initials adds a thoughtful touch. ($15-$30)
9. **Skincare Samples**: A set of sample-sized skincare products from a popular brand like Drunk Elephant or Sunday Riley would be a great introduction to new products. ($20-$40)
10. **Cozy Socks or Gloves**: A pair of soft, cozy socks or gloves would be a practical and thoughtful gift for the winter season. ($10-$25)

These ideas should fit your budget and provide a nice range of options for your friends and family.
